sentences.text: It was decided at the 2023 Vilnius summit that the Netherlands would be hosting the 2025 edition, marking the first time a NATO summit would take place in the country. The exact date and location, the World Forum (The Hague)|World Forum in The Hague, were announced by outgoing NATO Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg in May 2024. The last major diplomatic conference held in The Hague was the 2014 Nuclear Security Summit, and the city was chosen over Rotterdam, Apeldoorn, and Maastricht.

references.text: <ref>{{Cite news |url = https://www.volkskrant.nl/nieuws-achtergrond/navo-houdt-oekraine-voorlopig-aan-het-lijntje-zelensky-reageert-gefrustreerd~bb3bcaa7/ |url-access = subscription |date = 11 July 2023 |last = Brouwers |first = Arnout |access-date = 24 May 2024 |language = nl |website = de Volkskrant |title = Navo houdt Oekraïne voorlopig aan het lijntje, Zelensky reageert gefrustreerd |trans-title = NATO keeps Ukraine in suspense, Zelensky is frustrated }}</ref>

<ref>{{Cite press release |url = https://www.nato.int/cps/en/natohq/news_225618.htm |date = 24 May 2024 |access-date = 24 May 2024 |website = NATO |title = The Netherlands to host 2025 NATO Summit in The Hague }}</ref>

<ref name="nrc">{{Cite news |url = https://www.nrc.nl/nieuws/2024/05/24/navo-top-in-2025-in-den-haag-alles-wordt-uit-de-kast-gehaald-a4199918 |url-access = subscription |date = 24 May 2024 |last = Derix |first = Steven |access-date = 25 May 2024 |language = nl |website = NRC (newspaper)|NRC |title = NAVO-top in 2025 in Den Haag: 'Alles wordt uit de kast gehaald' |trans-title = 2025 NATO summit in the Hague: 'Pulling out all the stops' }}</ref>

sentences.text: It was estimated that the event would attract 8,500 attendants, of whom 6,000 delegation members, and would cost €95 million. Most of that amount would be covered by the national government, with €1.25 million to be paid by the municipality of The Hague. Johan de Wittlaan, along which the World Forum is located, would be closed off for four months.<ref name="nrc2"/>

references.text: <ref name="nrc"/><ref>{{Cite news |url = https://www.ad.nl/binnenland/den-haag-organiseert-in-2025-de-navo-top-mega-event-kost-95-miljoen~a5aa8b87/ |date = 24 May 2024 |last = Klaassen |first = Niels |access-date = 24 May 2024 |language = nl |website = Algemeen Dagblad |title = Den Haag organiseert in 2025 de Navo-top: mega-event kost 95 miljoen |trans-title = The Hague hosts NATO summit in 2025: Huge event will cost 95 million }}</ref>

<ref name="EW"/> Due to capacity issues, temporary structures were erected on the street, for which trees and traffic lights were removed. The exterior of the World Forum was repainted, and the seats and lighting in the main auditorium were replaced.<ref name="EW">{{Cite news |url = https://www.ewmagazine.nl/nederland/achtergrond/2025/01/den-haag-organiseert-navo-top-dit-komt-er-allemaal-bij-kijken-1444161/ |date = 12 January 2025 |last = Joosten |first = Carla |access-date = 12 January 2025 |language = nl |website = Elsevier Weekblad|EW |title = Den Haag organiseert NAVO-top: dit komt er allemaal bij kijken |trans-title = The Hague hosts NATO summit: This is what it involves }}</ref>

sentences.text: The Dutch National Police announced plans to deploy 27,000 personnel – nearly half its total workforce – for what would be the largest security operation in its history. Resources would be concentrated around The Hague, Amsterdam Airport Schiphol, and the connecting route. with the Arnhem–Veenendaal Classic|Veenendaal-Veenendaal cycling race cancelled as a result – however the Amstel Gold Race (the biggest Dutch road cycling race) will take place following negotiations between the police and the Royal Dutch Cycling Union. Other events cancelled owing to the summit include the Veterans' Day (Netherlands)|Veterans' Day parade.

references.text: <ref>{{Cite web |date=2025-01-29 |title=Amstel Gold Race gaat door, toch politiebegeleiding bij Nederlandse wielerklassieker |trans-title=Amstel Gold Race to go ahead, but police escort to Dutch cycling classic |url=https://nos.nl/artikel/2553714-amstel-gold-race-gaat-door-toch-politiebegeleiding-bij-nederlandse-wielerklassieker |access-date=2025-01-29 |website=nos.nl |language=nl |quote=de NAVO-top in juni in Den Haag, waarbij 27.000 politiemedewerkers worden ingezet. |trans-quote=the NATO summit in June in The Hague, where 27,000 police officers will be deployed.}}</ref>
